title: 3dRudder Foot Motion Controller Plugin
description: The 3dRudder is an amazing foot-powered motion controller for VR, gaming and 3D, and for moving in your scenes in UE4 Editor and VR Editor. This version is obsolete go to https://3drudder-dev.com/downloads/#unreal-engine to download the latest
longDescription:
To develop with our Asset/Plugin, it's necessary to use our 3dRudder dev Kit. For this, please contact us at support@3drudder.com

Warning: this version is obsolete go to our website to download the latest version and PS4 support


Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ktm5qnWx-rI

The 3dRudder is an amazing foot-powered controller that can be used in a variety of settings.

In VR, for simulation or gaming, the 3dRudder enables the users to move intuitively and naturally with their feet while their hands focus on doing. It only takes a few seconds for anyone to learn how to use it, even for people who do not know how to use a gamepad.

In Gaming, the 3dRudder lets you build new gameplays and offers a renewed experience to users.

Finally, the 3dRudder is a great accessibility device for anyone with upper body disabilities. When making a game, a computer software… accessible, the 3dRudder is a relevant addition.

The 3dRudder lets you move in both UE4 Editor and UE4 VR Editor. In VR Editor you’ll have the ability to hover over your scene and adopt any point of view intuitively. You’ll also be able to move objects while you move yourself. As you can use the 3dRudder directly at your desk you’ll be able to switch between Editor and VR Editor seamlessly.

technicalDetails:
List of Features:

The 3dRudder give 4 axis :

- Pitch : forward/backward

- Roll : strafing left/right

- Yaw : rotation left/right

- UpDown : move Up/down or Jump/Crouch


Axes and Status of 3dRudder are accessible from BluePrint.

Axes can be used as Input.


Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms: Windows 10 (64 bit)

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows 10 (64 bit)
